uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.util

Class KSingleton<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.util.KSingleton<S>

  • public class KSingleton<S>
extends java.lang.Object
    Supplies a singleton object that is initially created and registered via the static initialisation method an "initialisation class". When the first attempt is made to retrieve the singleton, a check is made to ensure that the initialisation class has been initialised, and hence that the singleton has been registered.
